10 characters
This is very exciting. Been checking this thread daily for many weeks now.
How much memory you rekon this will eat up Proot? My gamedata folder is a flat gig so I should have plenty of room regardless. Eagerly awaiting your release.

So I gess this can be undone... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76972-0-23-5-KSPRC-The-Renaissance-Compilation-artworks-remake-V-0-1513-18-4-2014

You're just insanely good, aren't you...even the OP is now amazing.
I have to agree with NathanKell here. This is so much more than just "a bunch of textures and sounds". The OP is hilarious also. Great work!
You definitely won the prize for the funniest OP. All those nice pictures you rock proot
Yes! Released! Downloading now...can't wait to see what you have done!

i don't know, maybe, i have seen pictures that would suggest that it works but due to a lack of reports of this overall, i say use at your own risk

Hello, I am having an issue whenever I open the VAB or even the Tracking Station, the game engine freezes and I can only press the "Back" button on the bottom right when in game. Do you have any ideas of a way to fix this?
